# Lawful Sword (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Weapon touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 131

*Calling to mind thoughts of justice, you run your fingers along the weapon, imbuing it with power.*

This spell functions like *[[Holy Sword (Spell)|holy sword]]*, except as follows. The weapon functions as a *+5 [[Axiomatic (MagWpnSpcAb)|axiomatic]] weapon* (+5 enhancement bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls, lawful-aligned, deals an extra 2d6 points of damage against chaotic opponents). It also emits a *[[Magic Circle Against Chaos (Spell)|magic circle against chaos]]* effect (as the spell).
